meanings.definition: Inflammation of one or both parotid glands.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with parotitises after examining their swollen glands.
meanings.sent2: Parotitises can cause pain and swelling in the cheeks.
meanings.sent3: The parotitises in the glands made the patient look like a chipmunk.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks felt like they were filled with parotitises, ready to burst.
meanings.sent5: The inflammation of the parotid glands, known as parotitises, can be quite uncomfortable.

meanings.sent1: The doctor discussed the parotitises of the patients in the ward.
meanings.sent2: There were multiple cases of parotitises reported in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The parotitises in the records were causing confusion among the staff.
meanings.sent4: The parotitises of cases kept increasing, alarming the medical team.
meanings.sent5: The chart showed a rise in parotitises, indicating a possible outbreak.
